document_data.mainbody:
Oulam was a necromancer that lived in the Baldurs Gate region of the Sword Coast for a time during the midâ€“14 century DR.
He wore a robe of electrical resistnace, and carried with him a handful darts of stunning.
In the , Oulam joined with the Zhentarim agent Niemain, along with two other mages, Wheber Ott and Willaim Garst, to cast an especially difficult spell on the second floor of Sorcerous Sundries in Baldurs Gate.
